txt.en: The Lossoth maintain beacons to help the lost find their way and to call for aid when it is needed.

'Welcome to Sûri-kylä. Perhaps you have seen the Kantâ-vilkku on your journey? The Kantâ-vilkku helps guide travellers and provides a means of survival in the harsh storms that too often visit us.

'Storms and harsh winds have done a good deal of damage to our beacon. If you seek to aid us, maybe you would help to fix the damage?

'The Kantâ-vilkku is east and south of Sûri-kylä along the drifts that overlook the bay, and you will find the parts scattered around the ground near at hand.'

The Kantâ-vilkku is east and a little south of Sûri-kylä along the snow drifts that look over the ice bay of Forochel.\n\nMatti has asked that you go to the Kantâ-vilkku and use the parts found there to repair it.
'The repairs are done? That is well, [placeholder]. With the recent storms, the Kantâ-vilkku will see more use than it has for many long years.'
The Kantâ-vilkku is east and a little south of Sûri-kylä along the snow drifts that look over the ice bay of Forochel.\n\nMatti has asked that you visit the Kantâ-vilkku and repair it.
Matti is at Sûri-kylä, west and a little north from the Kantâ-vilkku.\n\nYou should return to Matti and tell him of your success.

'How go the repairs? Many lost travellers and hunters rely upon the Kantâ-vilkku for their survival. Ensuring that it is well-maintained is very important.\n\n'The Kantâ-vilkku is east and south of Sûri-kylä along the snow drifts that look over the ice bay of Forochel. Once your work is complete, return here so that we may speak again.'

'How go the repairs? Many lost travellers and hunters rely upon the Kantâ-vilkku for their survival. Ensuring that it is well-maintained is very important.\n\n'The Kantâ-vilkku is east and south of Sûri-kylä. Once your work is complete, return here so that we may speak again.'
